0.1.name: wordpress/seven-days
0.1.description:
• set widget to show / hide by day condition (Sun - Sat)

Feature:

  • Show/Hide on specific day for "Widget"
  • Very friendly UI

Use cases

  • Daily food menu : restaurant
  • Daily notice : shop
  • Daily schedule : school

Share your ideas:

We would like to know how you use "Seven Days" and how "Seven Days" match your needs. Please share it here. It will benefit other who don't have clue about this plugin.

Relate Link: Plugin Homepage & Document
